Description: String of 13 glass beads of various sizes and shapes (cylindrical, globular, lentiform, discoid, biconical, fusiform, moniliform, polyhedral) some gilded.
Curator's comments: Concerning glass beads, see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 79 § 79.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 79 § 79)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.86, p.187, pl.29)
